metadata.title: CVE-2022-1462 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s TeleTYpesubsystem. The issue occurs in how a user triggers a race condition usingioctls TIOCSPTLCK and TIOCGPTPEER and TIOCSTI and TCXONC with leakage ofmemory in the flush_to_ldisc function. This flaw allows a local user tocrash the system or read unauthorized random data from memory.
